Message:
I continued walking
clinging to that belief,
but all I saw were flames.

The people I was supposed
to protect... My home...
Everything was...

I should have protected
everyone’s future...right?
Didn’t I?

Tell me that I did protect everyone...
That...this is all one big lie...

...Am I really...all alone?
Did I really destroy...everything...?
No... God, no...!

I hear a voice.
One as powerful as a flame...

“For the sake of the future
you fought to protect,
I will defeat you right where you stand!”

As that powerful voice
resounds in my ears,
the black flames
begin to disappear...
